description: This table contains dispense information for orders.

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: RX_FILL_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Prescription fill level note from the requesting source.

columns.name: ACQ_COST_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Cost code used when calculating acquisition cost for the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Average Wholesale Price


DP


CMS FFP


CMS FFP FOR UNIT DOSE ITEMS


WAC


Acquisition Cost


Suggested Wholesale Price


Alternative Benchmark Price


Manufacturer Suggested Retail Price


Pharmacy Retail Price

columns.name: CHARGING_CSN
columns.description: Contains the patient contact serial number (CSN) of the pharmacy visit contact to use for charge and payment posting.

columns.name: EMRG_FILL_YN
columns.description:
Is the current fill an emergency fill. An emergency fill is a short term refill that is approved by a pharmacist so that a patient can stay on their therapy while waiting for a refill authorization request (RAR) to be approved.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: EMERG_FILL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The discrete reason the user gave for creating an emergency fill.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EMERG_FILL_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID for a note (HNO) containing the free text additional details given for why it is necessary to create an emergency fill.

columns.name: TAX_DUE_TOTAL
columns.description: This column holds the rounded value for the total amount due in taxes when the medication was sold.

columns.name: FILL_START_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date the patient is expected to begin taking a particular dispense of a prescription.

columns.name: TAX_EXEMPT_YN
columns.description:
The column holds whether the tax was exempted when the medication was sold.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EMRG_FILL_YN

columns.name: ADJUD_REVERSE_ONLY_YN
columns.description:
This indicates that an adjudication with a failed reversal should not be resubmitted once the reversal failure is corrected. This will only ever be set for adjudications from Hyperspace. It is not used for Willow Ambulatory.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EMRG_FILL_YN

columns.name: RX_FILL_NAME_BRAND
columns.description: The brand name for the prescription fill. E.g. in the name "TYLENOL (acetaminophen) 325 mg tablets", this would be "TYLENOL".

columns.name: RX_FILL_NAME_GENERIC
columns.description: The generic name for the prescription fill. E.g. in the name "TYLENOL (acetaminophen) 325 mg tablets", this would be "acetaminophen".

columns.name: RX_FILL_IS_BRAND_YN
columns.description:
Is the fill for a brand medication. This helps determine how the medication name for the fill should be displayed. E.g. if it's a fill for a brand medication, the name would be "TYLENOL (acetaminophen) 325 mg tablets". If it's a fill for a generic medication, the generic medication name would display first. The default is No.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EMRG_FILL_YN

columns.name: RX_FILL_NAME_DOSAGE
columns.description: The dosage for the prescription fill. E.g. in the name "TYLENOL (acetaminophen) 325 mg tablets", this would be "325 mg tablets".

columns.name: RX_TAX_ROUNDING_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the rounding method used to calculate the total taxes for a medication sold within a transaction in an outpatient pharmacy.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Standard


Round Up

columns.name: TAX_EXEMPTED_TOTAL
columns.description: This column contains the rounded value for total amount of taxes exempted when the medication was sold.

columns.name: FILL_END_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date the patient is expected to end taking a particular dispense of a prescription.

columns.name: FILL_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Which therapy episode does this order fill correspond to

columns.name: FILL_THERAPY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The therapy type for this order's fill


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FILL_LINE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The line type for this order's fill


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FILL_DELIVERY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The delivery type for this order's fill. Delivery type refers to the type of infusion pump, not which shipping carrier


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FILL_DOSES_NUM
columns.description: The number of doses included in the fill. Typically calculated from the fill start and end date, but can be manually changed

columns.name: SCHEDULED_FILL_YN
columns.description:
Specifies whether this is a scheduled fill.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EMRG_FILL_YN

columns.name: OVERRIDE_SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The override date of service for a prescription fill

columns.name: RX_REFILL_REQ_SER_ADDRESS_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique ID for the receiving provider's address on the refill request. It is used to identify an address using I SER 21000.

columns.name: FILL_WASTED_QTY
columns.description: The amount of a dispense that was wasted in a home infusion shipment.
